title: Business Hours: Closing (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Closing subcategory within Business Hours. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.romaji: Koko wa nan-ji ni shimarimasu ka?
cards.japanese: ここは何時に閉まりますか？

cards.english: The kitchen will close at 12 o'clock.
cards.romaji: Ju ni-ji ni kitchin ga shimarimasu.
cards.japanese: 十二時にキッチンが閉まります。

cards.english: This restaurant closes at 11pm. The kitchen closes at 10pm.
cards.romaji: Kono resutoran wa ju ichi-ji ni shimarimasu. Kitchin wa ju-ji ni shimarimasu.
cards.japanese: このレストランは十一時に閉まります。キッチンは十時に閉まります。
